about.summary: Full-Stack and AI Engineer focused on scalable backend systems, real-time architectures, and production-ready agentic AI workflows.

projects.name: Curiobot
projects.description: An AI-powered study assistant that converts static PDFs into structured, interactive learning sessions using multi-agent workflows, high-performance backend systems, and visual mind mapping.
features: Implements a multi-agent pipeline using LangGraph with nodes for topic extraction, summarization, Q&A, and mind-map generation.
Handles PDF ingestion via Google Cloud Storage and triggers async processing through Python asyncio workers.
FastAPI routes orchestrate embeddings, metadata extraction, and retrieval without blocking I/O.
Stores embeddings in Pinecone and performs similarity search for context retrieval.
Redis provides low-latency caching of document metadata and processed chunks.
Generates hierarchical mind-map JSON structures consumed by React Flow on the frontend.
Deployed as separate Dockerized services for isolated, reproducible builds.

projects.name: Document Analyzer
projects.description: An AI-powered document analysis platform that converts uploaded files into conversational insights using retrieval, LLMs, and Next.js UI.
features: Uploads documents through Next.js API routes and stores them in Google Cloud Storage.
Triggers backend parsing and embedding generation through FastAPI endpoints.
Stores embeddings and metadata in Pinecone for high-accuracy retrieval.
Chat history is persisted in NeonDB for long-term session continuity.
Uses Gemini 2.5 Flash for context-aware answer synthesis.
Implements secure OAuth + JWT session handling via NextAuth.
Provides type-safe frontend–backend communication through TypeScript models.

projects.name: ChessVerse
projects.description: A modern, real-time multiplayer chess application built for high performance and seamless user experience with a futuristic 'Cyber-Chess' aesthetic.
features: Implements a Client-Server architecture with custom WebSocket handling using the `ws` library.
Features a Singleton `GameManager` for efficient matchmaking and game state management.
Validates all moves server-side using `chess.js` to prevent cheating and ensure integrity.
Uses optimistic UI updates on the frontend for a lag-free experience, with server reconciliation.
Styled with Tailwind CSS v4, featuring a dark 'Cyber-Chess' theme with neon emerald accents.

projects.name: ClickPe.ai
projects.description: An intelligent financial dashboard that aggregates loan offers and provides personalized recommendations based on user credit profiles, featuring an AI-driven financial assistant.
features: Aggregates and filters loan products based on dynamic user criteria like credit score, income, and tenure.
Integrates Vercel AI SDK to provide a context-aware chat assistant for financial guidance.
Uses Next.js App Router and Server Actions for secure and efficient data handling.
Implements a robust PostgreSQL database schema managed via Prisma ORM.
Features a responsive, accessible UI built with Tailwind CSS v4 and Radix UI components.
Secure authentication flow using HTTP-only cookies and JWT.

projects.name: Ashmark – Premium T-Shirt E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: A production-grade eCommerce platform with complete product flows, admin dashboards, and secure payments.
features: Implements guest carts through localStorage and authenticated carts in MySQL via Prisma.
End-to-end order lifecycle: Razorpay order creation → payment signature verification → persistent order tracking.
Admin panel built with custom Next.js server components and ShadCN primitives.
UploadThing handles product image uploads with metadata stored in Prisma.
Catalog uses infinite scrolling and dynamic routes for efficient rendering.
Role-based access controls allow admins to manage products, orders, and users.

projects.name: Synapsis Portfolio Website
projects.description: A professional portfolio website built for Synapsis Medical Technologies, showcasing projects with smooth UI animations.
features: Statically rendered pages improve performance and SEO.
Framer Motion controls staggered element animations and page transitions.
UI built from reusable components — cards, sections, headers, grids.
Tailwind + ShadCN form a consistent design system across the site.
Deployed as a lightweight Next.js static build.

projects.name: Twitter Clone
projects.description: A MERN-based microblogging platform featuring Google authentication and real-time posting.
features: REST API handles posts, user profiles, and timeline retrieval.
Google OAuth provides secure session handling.
Uses MongoDB for storing posts, comments, and media references.
Infinite scroll is implemented using paginated queries.
UploadThing supports media uploads with URLs stored in MongoDB.
Material UI defines a modular visual component system.

projects.name: Chat Website
projects.description: A real-time messaging platform using WebSockets for instant communication.
features: Uses the low-level `ws` library to manage WebSocket connections manually.
Each connected client receives broadcasted messages with minimal overhead.
MongoDB persists messages for long-term history retrieval.
Implements online/offline presence using connection lifecycle events.
React frontend listens to WebSocket events to instantly reflect new messages.

projects.name: Foodie Website
projects.description: A clean, modern recipe platform allowing users to browse and upload recipes.
features: Stores recipe metadata, text, and images inside a database.
Uses UploadThing or custom API routes for media uploads.
Guest-only browsing and submission — no authentication required.
Server-rendered pages for SEO and fast load times.
Tailwind components provide reusable layout and card structures.
